title: Squareone Configuration
description: Publicly-viewable configuration for a Squareone instance.

siteName.title: Site name
siteName.description: Used as the basis of the HTML title tag. This should be customized for each science platform deployment.

siteDescription.default: Welcome to the Rubin Science Platform
siteDescription.title: Site description
siteDescription.description: Used as the default site description in the HTML meta..

baseUrl.title: Base URL for the public ingress

docsBaseUrl.title: Base URL for the user documentation site.
docsBaseUrl.description: Used for computing URLs for user documentation pages for this RSP instance. The default is for the public RSP. For USDF, use ``https://rsp.lsst.io/v/usdfprod``. Does not end in /.

semaphoreUrl.title: Semaphore URL
semaphoreUrl.description: URL prefix of the Semaphore API service for obtaining notifications and broadcasts. Does not end in /. Omit or set as null to disable Semaphore features.

timesSquareUrl.title: Times Square API URL
timesSquareUrl.description: URL prefix of the Times Square API service. Does not end in /. Omit or set as null to disable the /times-square/ pages.

coManageRegistryUrl.title: COmanage registry URL (e.g. https://id.lsst.cloud). Omit or set as null for non-COmanage deployments.

plausibleDomain.title: Plausible tracking domain
plausibleDomain.description: Domain (e.g. data.lsst.cloud) for Plausible tracking. Omit to disable Plausible.

mdxDir.title: MDX content directory
mdxDir.description: Directory path where MDX content files are located. Can be relative (development) or absolute (production with ConfigMap).

footerMdxPath.title: Footer MDX content path
footerMdxPath.description: Path to MDX file for footer content, relative to mdxDir. If not provided, uses default hardcoded footer content.

sentryTracesSampleRate.title: Sentry traces sample rate
sentryTracesSampleRate.description: The percentage of traces to send to sentry. A number between 0 and 1 inclusive, where zero means don't send any traces, and 1 means send all traces.

sentryReplaysSessionSampleRate.title: Sentry replay session sample rate
sentryReplaysSessionSampleRate.description: The percentage of replay sessions to send to Sentry. A number between 0 and 1 inclusive, where zero means don't send any sessions, and 1 means send all sessions.

sentryReplaysOnErrorSampleRate.title: Sentry error replay session sample rate
sentryReplaysOnErrorSampleRate.description: The percentage of replay sessions to send to Sentry when an error occurs. A number between 0 and 1 inclusive, where zero means don't send any sessions, and 1 means send all sessions.

sentryDebug.title: Sentry debug
sentryDebug.description: Setting this option to true will print useful information to the console while you're setting up Sentry.

enableAppsMenu.title: Enable the Apps menu
enableAppsMenu.description: Setting this option to true will enable the Apps menu in the header.

appLinks.title: Application links
appLinks.description: Links to be displayed in the Apps menu

href.description: URL or path for the link

internal.description: Whether this is an internal route or external URL

showPreview.title: Show preview badge
showPreview.description: Whether to show the preview badge on the homepage hero

previewLink.title: Preview badge link URL
previewLink.description: URL for the preview badge link

headerLogoUrl.title: Header logo URL
headerLogoUrl.description: HTTPS URL to an external logo image. Takes priority over headerLogoData if both are set. If neither URL nor data is provided, uses the default Rubin Observatory logo. When using this option, headerLogoWidth must also be provided.

headerLogoData.title: Header logo base64 data
headerLogoData.description: Base64-encoded image data (without the data URL prefix). Must be used together with headerLogoMimeType and headerLogoWidth. Used only if headerLogoUrl is not provided.

headerLogoMimeType.title: Header logo MIME type
headerLogoMimeType.description: MIME type for the base64-encoded logo data (e.g., 'image/png', 'image/jpeg', 'image/svg+xml'). Required when headerLogoData is provided.

headerLogoHeight.title: Header logo height
headerLogoHeight.description: Height of the header logo in pixels.

headerLogoWidth.title: Header logo width
headerLogoWidth.description: Width of the header logo in pixels. Required when using headerLogoUrl or headerLogoData to ensure correct aspect ratio.

headerLogoAlt.title: Header logo alt text
headerLogoAlt.description: Alternative text for the header logo for accessibility.
